name: MOCHI CULT
description: MOCHI CULT ($MOCHI) is a cultural and community-driven project that blends traditional Japanese mochi-making with Web3 innovation. Through 24/7 livestreams on PumpFun, the project shares tutorials, answers questions, and engages with viewers in real time. Our mission is to preserve and spread the joy of mochi-making while building a global community that connects food, culture, and blockchain. $MOCHI creates a unique ecosystem where education, entertainment, and crypto come together.
